Insertion Sort 
 
 
The Algorithm: 
 
Start with the second element 
If it's smaller than the first 
element, swap them 
If not, leave them alone 
Now we the first two are sorted 
Move to the third element 
Place it in order with the first 
two elements 
Now we have three sorted elements 
Keep putting the next element in 
its sorted place until the entire 
list is sorted 
 
 
Fun Facts: \ 
*Most people sort card using a method 
 similar to insertion sort 
*Like selection sort, insertion 
 is one of the slower sorts 
*Each element in the list is checked twice 
 when sorting
